sub_title: Executive communications training, content and coaching at Media Wise | Multilingual former journalist with extensive international experience
summary:
Substantial experience in corporate, sustainability and financial communications and in serving the healthcare, technology, food/agriculture and green tech sectors. 
Mission: to present complexity in a clear and compelling way, across cultures and borders.    
Approach: journalistic and strategic. 
Focus on helping companies communicate their story effectively to key audiences, internal and external. 
Services: media, presentation and crisis communications training, issues management, PR, writing,  editing, audiovisual, translations, debate moderation.  
Working in English (native), Dutch, French, Italian and Spanish.

awards: [{'title': 'Winner of AEX Amsterdam Stock Exchange Prize for Broadcast Journalism', 'description': 'I was editor of a series on commercial TV, produced under the auspices of Ivo Niehe Producties for RTL-5  in 1998, called De Beslissers. It examined recent crises in international business and finance and asked the protagonist decision makers how they coped. The production team responsible had only three members - myself, the presenter and a logistics person. We won this prestigious national prize against fierce competition from other commercial and public TV and radio productions. ', 'issuer': 'Amsterdam Stock Exchange (now Euronext Amsterdam)', 'date': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1999}}]
